skillTree.name: Harsh Survivor
skillTree.description: Rest is for the weak; one must harry the enemy in relentless pursuit and leave them no time to regroup.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Brass-Lunged
skillTree.description: This Lord belts out orders and can be heard even across a battlefield smothered in the grim noise of war.

skillTree.name: Ursun's Protection
skillTree.description: Naught can penetrate the swirling mists of ice and sleet that churn around those afforded Father Bear's protection.

skillTree.name: Experienced Trapper
skillTree.description: Ilja has been a hunter longer than most of his contemporaries have been alive, and he has no compunction about using every trick of the trade to stay ahead of his prey.

skillTree.name: Trap the Prey
skillTree.description: No matter how strong the prey, if it cannot run, it's vulnerable.

target_if: Unit is not composed of a single entity

skillTree.name: Fury of Ursun
skillTree.description: Ilja's arms and shoulders are mighty, and no one, even amongst the Sibyrians, dare to challenge him in a contest of power.

skillTree.name: Pick Off
skillTree.description: A perfectly placed shot from Ilja's bow will down even the mightiest of targets. All from the safety of cover.

ui_effects.description: Requires line of sight to the target

target_if: Unit is not composed of a single entity

skillTree.name: Hate the Foul
skillTree.description: Ilja openly challenges the creatures of Chaos and the Beastman Warbands, bringing their hides to the feet of the Tzarina in the yearly Summer Fair.

effects.description: Melee attack: +3 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Norsca and Beastmen
Missile damage: +5% when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Norsca and Beastmen.
Weapon strength: +5% for all units when fighting against Norsca, Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos and Beastmen
Melee attack: +6 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Norsca and Beastmen
Missile damage: +10% when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Norsca and Beastmen.
Weapon strength: +10% for all units when fighting against Norsca, Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos and Beastmen
Melee attack: +9 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Norsca and Beastmen
Missile damage: +15% when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Norsca and Beastmen.
Weapon strength: +15% for all units when fighting against Norsca, Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos and Beastmen

skillTree.name: Expert Hunters
skillTree.description: Ilja's knowledge can be passed on to others like him, those who understand the frozen motherland of Kislev.

effects.description:
Passive ability: "Experienced Trapper" for Kossar units.
	(all units in army)

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Soothsaying
skillTree.description: Speaking words of power or faith can alter perceptions on the battlefield.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Inviolable
skillTree.description: Never to be broken or dishonoured - never to succumb to the foe.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Always Ready
skillTree.description: Death is always just a shot away.

skillTree.name: Blacker Powder
skillTree.description: "It's got a few secret ingredients. No, I won't tell you what they are, but the results will speak for themselves."

skillTree.name: Powder Monkey
skillTree.description: "Get more ammo up here, NOW!!!!!!!!"

skillTree.name: Requisition
skillTree.description: If a Master Engineer wants something, he'll get it. Quartermasters can rarely refuse a demanding Guild engineer.

skillTree.name: Gunsight
skillTree.description: A clever arrangement of lenses makes the target seem just that bit closer.

skillTree.name: Triangulation
skillTree.description: Engineers use number-lore to work out the best trajectories and prime killing arcs for their war machines.

skillTree.name: Sapper
skillTree.description: A Sapper excels at breaking entrenched foes. He can quickly get artillery into the best position.

effects.description:
Speed: +3% for all missile units
	(Hero's army)

Speed: +8% for all missile units
	(Hero's army)

Speed: +15% for all missile units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Ballistics Instructor
skillTree.description: Those Engineers conversant in ballistics know how best to increase the ranges of their weapons.

skillTree.name: Training
skillTree.description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 20
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 35
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.name: Spread Control
skillTree.description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Assault Garrison
skillTree.description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: Assault Units
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Blessed of the Great Bear
backgroundSkills.description: Ilja of Murova has won every contest of strength in Kislev during the last twenty years. Once, by the personal request of the Tzarina, he wrestled a great grizzly bear unarmed and emerged victorious.

effects.description:
Attributes: Stalk and Strider for Kossar units.
	(all units in army)
